Getting Started: Installation

Clone Repository

git clone https://github.com/kyounghunJang/Medisecuremask

Language and Requirement

  • Python

  • Spark 3.0 ↑

  • MySQL

  • Flask

  • boto3

  • pillow

  • easyocr

  • opencv

  • numpy

  • pandas

MySQL Download Doc

https://docs.inductiveautomation.com/display/DOC80/Installing+MySQL

Pyspark Downlod Doc

https://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/api/python/getting_started/install.html

Download Python Libraries

pip install Flask boto3 Pillow easyocr opencv-python numpy pandas
